entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
